metadata.title: Want to know what Inteli students can develop in ten weeks? - Inteli - Institute of Technology and Leadership

Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text:
Inteli>Inteli Sprint>Want to know what Inteli students can develop in ten weeks?

- Inteli Team
- 15 May 2023
- Inteli Team
- 15 May 2023
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: "All this experience makes me much better prepared for the job market. What I've experienced here, no other college in Brazil can offer me."
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: This is the opinion ofMaurício de Azevedo Neto, from the class ofComputer Scienceabout the incredible journey here at Inteli during the first module of 2023.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: Here at Inteli, the teaching methodology used is project-based learning (PBL).Project Based Learning (PBL).Students are challenged to develop a solution to a market partner's problem. To do this, they need to put into practice what they learn in theory, always working as part of a team.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: In the first quarter, we welcomed theUnipar Group, the Technological Research Institute (IPT), Coover, Dell Technologies, AEL Sistemas, V.tal, Cia de Talentos, the Federal University of Alagoas and the USP Medical School toour campus. Want to know what happened? Check out this post.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: How does it work?
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: At Inteli, the Project Office is responsible for selecting the best challenges for our students, as well as helping with the entire project development process.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: The aim is to attract companies, NGOs or government institutions with real problems that can be addressed by developing the solutions envisaged in the academic model. The biannual selection of partners ensures that the curriculum is never out of date. We are always challenged by our partners' challenges.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: And what is the opinion of the managers who took part in the experience in the first semester?"I have no doubt that they will leave extremely prepared for the job market"says Luiz Brotto, senior advisor at Dell.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: Luciana Carvalho Barros, a researcher at USP's Faculty of Medicine, highlights the satisfaction in new ways of looking at the organization's problems."The project continues outside these walls and will certainly have a big impact on the patients and the care team," she says.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: Discipline, self-study and teamwork
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: Bianca Cassemiro's group, from theComputer Engineeringworked with the Institute of Technological Research (IPT) on a project to automate a robotic arm with the aim of carrying out the magnetic separation of ores.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: To get there, the students learned programming, UX, business and leadership skills."The communication channel is very fluid and the entire teaching team helps us as much as possible to resolve doubts and problems," says Bianca,says Bianca.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: Maurício's team was given the challenge by V.tal, a neutral fiber optic company, to develop an effective and entertaining game for employees about the company's code of ethics and conduct.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: "We created a game in which the character goes through various situations that put his knowledge of the company's compliance to the test, while at the same time educating the player. We also inserted situations that address all of the organization's stakeholders"explains the young man.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: For teacher-supervisor Fabiana Martins, the period was a lot of work and focus on organizing and applying agile methodologies aimed at specific learning, such as programming logic, calculus 1 and 2, swot analysis, applying qualitative and quantitative tests, discipline in academic writing and so on.
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?

content_blocks.text: "The first quarter demands a lot of patience and self-management from the students. But working with a real client stimulates the students and really brings unimaginable knowledge. By the end of the module, the methodology makes perfect sense to them," says Fabiana. Are you curious to know more about Inteli?Watch the videoon how Inteli can help boost your career
content_blocks.section: Want to know what Inteli students are capable of developing in ten weeks?
